instruction.value: Apply a small amount to the affected area in the morning and at bedtime.
Apply a small amount to the affected area after bowel movement PRN.
Attach rectal cannula to tube, insert rectally to full extent and squeeze tube gently from lower end while withdrawing; in the morning and at bedtime.
Attach rectal cannula to tube, insert rectally to full extent and squeeze tube gently from lower end while withdrawing; after bowel movement PRN.

ahfsname.value: Skin and Mucous Membrane Agents, Anti-inflammatory Agents
